javelin.model.world.place.unique

Class UniqueLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.WorldActor
      • javelin.model.world.place.WorldPlace
        • javelin.model.world.place.guarded.GuardedPlace
          • javelin.model.world.place.unique.UniqueLocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Artificer, Haxor, MercenariesGuild

    public abstract class UniqueLocation
extends GuardedPlace
    An unique location is a WorldPlace that is only featured in a single location in the World map during a game. They are usually places of high power, which makes them WorldActor.impermeable by default.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
